name: iperf3_netdev_600_4000_250000
pre_src_cmd: sysctl -w net.core.netdev_budget=600; sysctl -w net.core.netdev_budget_usecs=4000; sysctl -w net.core.netdev_max_backlog=250000
pre_dst_cmd: sysctl -w net.core.netdev_budget=600; sysctl -w net.core.netdev_budget_usecs=4000; sysctl -w net.core.netdev_max_backlog=250000
post_src_cmd: sysctl -w net.core.netdev_budget=300; sysctl -w net.core.netdev_budget_usecs=2000; sysctl -w net.core.netdev_max_backlog=1000
post_dst_cmd: sysctl -w net.core.netdev_budget=300; sysctl -w net.core.netdev_budget_usecs=2000; sysctl -w net.core.netdev_max_backlog=1000
